attributes.action: The Rich List should also include taxes paid
attributes.additional_details: The Richest People in the UK Is compiled each year to show how the rich are becoming richer each year, despite the country being in recession. I suggest that the tax contribution paid to British treasury is also published alongside the wealth figures in the Rich list to reveal who's contributing to the health of the nation's economy and who is not. The government would need to pass any required legislation so that HMRC can provide public access to relevant data.
